nodes.text: Star Wars: Yoda's Jedi Training was a free online browser game developed by Disney Interactive that loosely adapts events from the film Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. The game was released on Disney.co.uk on February 23, 2016.

Play Star Wars: Yoda's Jedi Training. Journey to Dagobah to learn the ways of the force under Jedi Master Yoda. Take Luke Skywalker through his training from Padawan to Jedi Knight, complete challenges and gain tokens to use in the Star Wars Arcade featuring new Star Wars games.
Star Wars: Yoda's Jedi Training on Disney.co.uk
